author: makortel
body: This PR assigns `MagneticField/Portable` package for `heterogeneous` and `reconstruction`. The package is being added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48729, package assignment follows a comment https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48729#issuecomment-3501217605.
title: Add `MagneticField/Portable` to `categories_map.py`
